article_title: Roundup: The World of Data This Week
article_text:
Good Advice: If you want better battery life and a faster phone, don't update your iPhone to iOS 8. Learn the difference between correlation and causation. It's useful when reading reports like this one. If you are a spoiler, you should probably stop. If you have blank walls, check out these hand-drawn maps. Lay off the sugar if you want to avoid high blood pressure. If you are single, move to these states.

Throwback: This is what it would look like if Leonardo Da Vinci designed the iPhone.

og.description: We look at the best data, charts and maps on the Internet.
